svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Meat production by commodity or product type, measured in tonnes per year. All data shown relate to total meat
production, from both commercial and farm slaughter. Data are given in terms of dressed carcass weight, excluding
Source: UN Food and Agricultural Organization (FAO)
